name: Super Penguin 4: Hot Hot Island
description: Super Penguin hits its fourth game! This is the story. When he left to go eat some fish the evil Flybirds came and stole his eggs. This time, they take it to there home, the Hot Hot Island. Hot Hot Island is known for their hot volcanoes that shoot hot rocks out. Your eggs can't survive the hot temperature. Be careful and get your eggs back before their cooked. Hop around this fun 2D game in Super Penguin 4: Hot Hot Island!
